title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama for quick model chatting and management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with reactive streaming and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to Ollama over REST; drop-in for any site.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama JS client with decorators for dependency injection.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embeddings, and model management in C#.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing admin UI and REST endpoints to manage and query local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and model streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama models into channels via mentions or app home.
